DOC.brief_title: The Effect Natural Extract Glucose Fluxes After Consumption Wheat Product
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian male . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.0 ≤ 25.0 kg/m2 . Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery inflammatory disease . Fasting blood glucose value volunteer ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/liter ( i.e . 62 110 mg/dl ) screening . HbA1c ≤ 6.5 % ( 48 mmol/mol ) . Use antibiotic within 3 month Day 1 ; use medication except paracetamol within 14 day Day 1 .
